meta.name: viewport
meta.title: Arena of Ratings - Advanced BST System

header.p:
Elite matchmaking & leaderboard system powered by advanced BST architecture.
Developed for Data Structures Lab Final Exam

div.p: Self-balancing player hierarchy based on rating
Advanced BST operations for competitive gaming
Efficient player join/leave operations with automatic tree restructuring and memory management
Find closest-rated opponents using successor/predecessor queries in logarithmic time
Real-time ranking system with K-th player lookup and range queries
Dynamic damage and healing mechanics with bounds checking and state management
Comprehensive statistics including height, leaf count, and structural analysis
Compute BST path distance using Lowest Common Ancestor algorithm

div.div: Insert new player into the arena
Find player with closest rating to X
